title: LLM Observability: 5 Essential Pillars for Production-Ready AI Applications
title1: Building Reliable LLM Applications for Production with LLM Observability
title2: 5 Best Practices to Building Reliable LLM Applications for Production
description: Technical leads who've successfully scaled LLM applications know that robust observability is beyond just tracking costs. Learn how LLM observability differs from traditional monitoring and discover 5 practical strategies to reduce hallucinations, prevent prompt injections, and optimize costs in production.
author: Lina Lam
